verses:
Halleluia---
come down holy spirit and fill our hearts
come and fill the hearts of all your faithful people
kindle in our hearts the fire of your love
Descend on us, creator spirit so 
come down ----

Send forth your spirit to us o lord 
Let it renuw all the facve of the earth
The love of God has been poured in our hearts 
by his spirit loving in his people. so come down----
